name: C++ Database
objective: Built a CRUD C++ Console App for a student and faculty records Database.
technologiesUsed: C++, Built-Data-Structures, Key-Value Pair BST, Stack, Linked List, OOP, makefile

name: C++ Game Of Life
objective: Built Game Of Life in C++ with 3 game modes: Classical, Doughnut, and Mirror. The program takes in an input file to get the number of rows and columns of the matrix. The program prompts the user for further options.
technologiesUsed: C++, 2D Array, Dynamic Memory Allocation, Console Sleep/Pause, Input Validation

name: C++ Delimiter Syntax Checker
objective: Built a C++ app that takes in an input file that contains code. The program processes the file looking for delimiter syntax errors. If an error is found, the line number and a message is given to the user.
technologiesUsed: C++, Sorting Algorithms, Merge Sort, Quick Sort, Bubble Sort, Selection Sort, Insertion Sort, ctime, makefile

name: C++ Registrar Office
objective: Built a C++ Registrar Simulation App. It simulates a registrar office with windows helping students in a queue. The program takes in an input file for number of windows and number of students in line.
technologiesUsed: C++, Built-Data-Structures, Queue, Linked List, OOP, makefile
